name: Subzero Design System
description:
Subzero is a collection of guidelines and components shared among designers and developers to create a streamlined and enjoyable user experience for all Axis Bank customers.


Rather than focusing on pixels, developers can focus on application logic, while designers can focus on user experience, interactions, and flows. We want designers and developers to find helpful information to fulfill their careers with the Subzero design system.



What's in for you?

  • Components and elements that can be assembled in different combinations and used to create amazing user experiences across web and mobile
  • Brings consistency and a clean minimal design across all the products
  • Enables collaboration amongst all stakeholders and creates an organized workflow which speeds up development and testing time
  • Helps in focusing on designing positive user experiences and adopting widespread implementation
